title: AI-based Symptom Checker
description: An intelligent web application designed to assess the likelihood of diabetes, stroke, and heart disease using Random Forest models. The platform allows users to input personal health data and symptoms to receive personalised risk insights, recommendations, and triage guidance. Built with a full-stack architecture using Vue.js, Node.js, MySQL, and a Flask microservice for machine learning predictions.

title: Project Expense Tracker Mobile App
description: Developed a comprehensive Android application for project managers to track, manage, and analyse expenses across multiple projects. This native mobile solution features real-time budget monitoring, expense categorisation, and data visualisation to streamline financial oversight.

title: Expense Tracker MAUI APP
description: Created a cross-platform expense management system using .NET MAUI framework to provide seamless expense tracking across devices. Implemented features including project favoriting, expense categorisation, and interactive budget visualisation with synchronised cloud storage.

title: Java Based Chat Application
description: Developed a Java-based chat application that enables real-time communication between users. The application features a user-friendly interface, allowing users to send and receive messages instantly. It supports multiple chat rooms, private messaging, and chat coordinators.

screenshots.alt: Java Chat application
screenshots.description: Java Chat application showing the chat rooms opened.

title: JustPlay
description: Currently developing a TypeScript-based web application designed to host and organise sports events. The platform enables users to create, manage, and participate in events while facilitating real-time communication. It features a user-friendly interface that supports instant messaging, multiple chat rooms, and private conversations, ensuring seamless interaction and coordination among users.
